member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger
member.summary: The logging class used by UII that implements a listening system to allow multiple listeners to hook in and log messages.

members.member: TraceSwitch to control logging traffic. do not globalize these strings; developer oriented

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.TryInitialize
member.summary: Provides for the explicit initialization of logging listeners, rather than defering to first use of the Logging class. Use of this method is not required.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.Error(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This is used to display messages that represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceError. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Name to give for the application.
The message to place in the log.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.Error(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: This is used to display messages that represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceError. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Name to give for the application.
The message to place in the log.
The exception used in writing out the error.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.Error(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: This is used to display messages that represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceError. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Nmae to give for the application
String format for the message to be placed in the log
Parameters to be substituted into the stirng format.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.Error(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This is used to display messages that represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceError. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Name to give for the application.
The message to place in the log.
Advanced/additional information.
member.remarks: The ShowErrors check is done at the individual listener level.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.Warn(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: This is used to display messages that may represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceWarning. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Name to give for the application
String format of the message
Parameters to be substituted into the string format
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.Info(System.String,System.String)

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.Trace(System.String)
member.summary: This is used to display messages for debugging but not normal operation. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceVerbose. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: The message to write out to the trace.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.ErrorCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the error count. (Incremented by every call to one of the Error() overloads.)

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.ShowErrors
member.summary: If set to true, then all Logging.Error() messages will be displayed in a messagebox. The default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.DiagnosticLogger.TraceSwitchLevel
member.summary: Level of the TraceSwitch("Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging").

member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.ILogging
member.summary: Interface for Logging listeners

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.ILogging.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: This is the method used to initialize the logging listener
member.param: The name of the listener.
The configuration values (parameters) for the listener.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.ILogging.Error(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to log an error message.
member.param: The application name used in the log.
The message used in the log.
Advanced message information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.ILogging.Warn(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to log a warning message.
member.param: The application name used in the log.
The message used in the log.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.ILogging.Information(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to log an informational message.
member.param: The application name used in the log.
The message used in the log.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.ILogging.Trace(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to log a trace message.
member.param: The application name used in the log.
The message used in the log.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.ILogging.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets user-defined data associated with the object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.ILogging.ShowErrors
member.summary: Boolean used to ensure errors are shown. It is up to the actual implementor/provider to use this or not.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.Logging
member.summary: The logging class used by UII that implements a listening system to allow multiple listeners to hook in and log messages. A TraceSwitch, Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging, is implemented to provide for the varying of log traffic.

members.member: TraceSwitch to control logging traffic. do not globalize these strings; developer oriented

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.Logging.TryInitialize
member.summary: Provides for the explicit initialization of logging listeners, rather than defering to first use of the Logging class. Use of this method is not required.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.Resources.LOG0100_UNABLETOCREATE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified listener type couldn't be instantiated: {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.Resources.LOG0103_INITERROR
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An error occurred while calling Initialize() on the specified listener type: {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Logging.Resources.LOG0104_NORECURSION
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Listeners can't call methods of the Logging class..
